verbose_text: Surprisingly, BETP was the only PAM that enhanced the Ca 2+ response to GLP-1 (7-36) NH 2 when pre-incubated, as previously described.2a This may reflect depletion of accessible intracellular Ca 2+ stores at a rate dependent on the intrinsic activity of the PAM.
evidence: PAM that enhanced the Ca 2+  response to GLP-1(7-36)NH
